title: Fragments, 18th century
medium:
Mordant-painted and dyed cotton (chintz)
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordants for madder colors hand painted; blue immersion dyed over resist; yellow applied by brush over blue for green; plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 5.1 x 51.4 cm (2 x 20 1/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 5.1 x 27.9 cm (2 x 11 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 3.8 x 36.8 cm (1 1/2 x 14 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (d): 6.4 x 27.9 cm (2 1/2 x 11 in.)
Warp x Weft (e): 4.4 x 26.7 cm (1 3/4 x 10 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (f): 4.4 x 27.3 cm (1 3/4 x 10 3/4 in.)
description: Chintz textile with symmetrical floral pattern in red, blue, green and yellow, with speckled purple background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 18th century.
18th century. Mordant-painted and dyed cotton (chintz)
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordants for madder colors hand painted; blue immersion dyed over resist; yellow applied by brush over blue for green; plain weave foundation. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-32-a/f.
